channel.title: UIDs and GIDs to use with slkbuild :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: Recommended UID/GIDs The recommended UID/GIDs for use with SLKBUILD scripts are the same as the ones for slackbuilds.org (Default Slackware UID/GIDs) in order to avoid conflicts with packages build from SBo. Extra This previous list is maintained by the SBo team. If you build a package that is not on that list, we can discuss about it on the mailing list. Warning Note that recommended UID/GIDs should not be created automatically when the user installs a package.
